typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		body as (fact as string, length as short),
		headers as [string,string]
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'rest',
	timeout: 30,
	httpMethod: 'GET',
	responseFormat: ['type' -> 'json', 'documentForm' -> 'singleDocument']) ~> sourceWebAPI
sourceWebAPI derive(fact = body.fact,
		date = currentTimestamp()) ~> ParseColumns
ParseColumns select(mapColumn(
		fact,
		date
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectFactDate
SelectFactDate sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'delimited',
	container: 'apidata',
	folderPath: 'facts',
	columnDelimiter: ',',
	escapeChar: '\\',
	quoteChar: '\"',
	columnNamesAsHeader: true,
	filePattern:(concat('catfact_', toString(currentTimestamp(), 'yyyy-MM-dd'), '.csv')),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> outputFile
